title: Decrypting non-cyrillic data (BIN file) which contains the date for renewal
content:
Hi everyone, good evening and something else.enter image description here
I have a .txt file which contains the license date, my email information.
My mission - decode this file and change date, then i need to convert this file back.
Dropbox with txt file
Pastebin with txt file
The order of the text containing the file is : Device code, flash drive code, mail, dates.
I will be very grateful to everyone for their help!
